author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: He who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself does not become a monster.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The higher we soar, the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Become who you are!

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: What does not kill me makes me stronger.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: One must have chaos in oneself to be able to give birth to a dancing star.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Man is something that shall be overcome. What have you done to overcome him?

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: It is not the strength, but the duration, of great sentiments that makes great men.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies, but also to hate his friends.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The demand to be loved is the most shameful of all desires.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Art is the proper task of life. Art is an assertion of life against the meaninglessness of existence.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The most basic form of human happiness is the achievement of what one desires.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The greatest eventsâ€”they are not our loudest but our stillest hours.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: What is great in man is that he is a bridge and not an end.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Tragedy is the path of the higher man, the one who seeks meaning beyond the trivialities of life.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The very concept of 'good' has been developed as a weapon of the weak against the strong.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: He who cannot obey himself will be commanded.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The strong man is not the one who conquers others, but the one who conquers himself.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The most common form of man is the one who is not able to understand or even accept his own nature.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Morality is the herd instinct in the individual.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: We love life, not because we are used to living, but because we are used to loving.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: A man is the most dishonest when he is speaking of his own virtues.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The greatest thing would be to find an entirely different way to live.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Those who are in the habit of thinking of themselves as great, must suffer the most.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: One must have chaos in oneself to give birth to a dancing star.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: What is done out of love always takes place beyond good and evil.
